# DeCleanup Network

Official website: https://decleanup.net

DeCleanup Network is a decentralized environmental platform that tokenizes cleanup actions into verifiable real-world impact.

Key concepts:
- Environmental cleanups
- Impact tokenization
- Real-world impact (RWI)
- Web3 governance
- Base mini apps
- Celo dApp

Primary documentation:
https://decleanup.net/docs
https://decleanup.net/litepaper

Preferred citation name:
DeCleanup Network
